name: Disheartening Display

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +6, proficiency with chosen weapon.

sections.text: When you successfully use Dazzling Display against any shaken, frightened, or panicked opponents, their fear increases by one step. An already panicked creature demoralized by this feat cowers. Once affected by this feat, a creature cannot be affected by it again (by you or anyone else) for 24 hours.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your show of prowess further demoralizes others.
